code: import{createUserWithEmailAndPassword,signInWithEmailAndPassword}from'@firebase/auth';import React,{useRef}from'react';import{auth}from'../firebase';import'./SignupScreen.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignupScreen(){var emailRef=useRef(null);var passwordRef=useRef(null);var register=function register(e){e.preventDefault();createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){console.log(authUser);}).catch(function(err){alert(err.message);});};var signIn=function signIn(e){e.preventDefault();signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){console.log(authUser);}).catch(function(err){alert(err.message);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"signup-screen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:emailRef,type:"email",placeholder:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:passwordRef,type:"password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:signIn,children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"signup-screen__grey",children:"New to Netflix?
